content: round 2 work all sts as they appear k the knits and p the purls to end repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 24 28 32 36 sts remain then repeat round 1 twice more at the end of your decreases you should have 16 20 24 28 stitches remaining 8 10 12 14 on the instep and 8 10 12 14 on the sole finishing cut yarn leaving a tail long enough to graft the toe close the toe using the kitchener stitch knit a second sock block if desired weave in ends and enjoy © rachel leggett 2019 4 leg chart all sizes © rachel leggett 2019
